page.title: 17TOURISM
page.content: Tourism plays an important part in {Shetland's}industry. Self-drive cars are available.There is a bus service which runs between{ Lerwick and the{Airport.}Aeroplanes take tourists from{Aberdeen}and Norway.}During the summer season boats travel from{ Sumburgh}to {Fair {Isle }twice weekly.{Fair Isle}is 24 miles SE of{Sumburgh Head.}There are various coach tours which run through Sumburgh visting the various tourist attractions.The coach tours run from Lerwick. The people may have come off the cruise ships which come from Russia,NE Europe and East Germany and also the ferry from Aberdeen and Norway. So,the airport is always very busy. There are many reasons why people visit Sumburgh. One of the main reasons has to be Jarlshof. The site is one of the most remarkable
